name: Not This Container (Secret Swan, jofloco12)
description:
Not This Container is a datamanagment game that the plot of the game is about mafias that work with port companies and smuggle goods illegal. Our protagonist is a stevedore who enters to work thanks to his family connection with the boss and will have to work very hard to solve your financial problems.

Not This Container is being developed by three students of computer engineering.

Website: https://sites.google.com/view/secretswanbcn

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SecretSwan5

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChHNJrpsLbCFscsZBdAhgLw
